channel.title: Martyuk and Sons
channel.description: Recent content on Martyuk and Sons

item.description: After we’re done with the strategy, we start on ideas. To kill two birds with one stone A great idea is already part strategy, and a great strategy is part idea. How one brain can contain both is a mystery and the special sauce of our consultancy. Petr Martyuk. An engineer-physicist by education and a creative director by profession. Petr is recognized as the second most creative person in Russia according to ACAR.
